Recovery Housing Stability and Support Act of 2023
To amend the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act to reauthorize the Recovery Housing Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Recovery Housing Stability and Support Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 the Recovery Housing Program, which is administered by the Department of Housing and Urban Development. The program supports the provision of transitional housing for those who are in recovery from a substance-use disorder for up to two years or until the individual finds permanent housing, whichever is earlier.
